about_the_game:
The Last Viking is an immersive first-person multiplayer cooperative survival game. You play as a young Viking warrior on a journey of survival, exploration, and discovery. Stranded on a secluded island filled with secrets and dangers, you must harness your skills to survive against the odds. Engage in epic battles, craft powerful tools, and uncover ancient mysteries as you strive to fulfill your destiny.

Exploring the world and survive


Step into a beautifully crafted world where survival is your primary goal. The island you explore is teeming with life and shrouded in mystery. Manage your hunger, thirst, sleep, and stay vigilant against the changing weather. Every corner of the island hides secrets that will aid you in your quest.

Fighting Enemies


Battle ferocious beasts, skeletons, and mythical creatures in intense combat. Master your weapons and hone your combat skills to take on the island's deadliest foes. Engage in thrilling boss fights against legendary creatures, each offering unique challenges.

Build and craft


Forge your path to survival by crafting essential tools and constructing vital shelters. Gather resources from the environment and discover recipes that will help you craft everything from simple weapons to powerful Viking gear. Build structures to protect yourself from the elements and upgrade your arsenal to stand a better chance against the dangers.

Play with your friend


Experience The Last Viking in cooperative multiplayer mode, where up to 8 players can team up to survive and conquer the island together. Share resources, strategize in combat, and build a Viking settlement with your friends.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a young viking, learn to survive and fight in the wilderness. To fulfill your destiny, explore an island alone or in cooperation with friends, build structures, confront Norse gods and mythological creatures. Will you be the last Viking?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
